thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt’s not-so ‘Shaandaar’ box office collection, earns Rs 33.51 cr on first weekend

title: Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt’s not-so ‘Shaandaar’ box office collection, earns Rs 33.51 cr on first weekend
text: Box-Office Report | Shaandaar FAILS 00:49 Alia Bhatt and Shahid Kapoor's Shaandaar was expected to be a massive box office success and the opening day collections of 13.10 Crores were satisfactory enough. But the film showed a remarkable drop on day two and subsequent collections haven't been encouraging. Recent related news The film has a disappointing weekend at the box office… Shaandaar, starring Alia Bhatt and Shahid Kapoor, had a huge buzz around the film but it did not turn... Bollywood Life 3 hours ago - India Mumbai, Oct 24 : Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt's recently released film Shaandaar has earned Rs. 20 crore in the box office so far. newKerala.com 2 days ago - Entertainment By BusinessofCinema News Network Bollywood film ‘Shaandaar’ starring Alia Bhatt and Shahid Kapoor has performed poorly on its second day at the box office....
